title: Carly's Revenge
description: "Carly Barton thought the wagon train ordeal of moving to a farm in Kansas was hard but her life was going to get much worse. During the wild and turbulent years on the frontier, she survived escaped convicts killing her parents and raping her, and then she started her own personal vendetta of finding and killing the murderers.Carly’s Revenge is a fast-paced western novel about an innocent young woman who swears vengeance against hardened criminals, knowing her chances are “slim-to-none” of finding them and surviving. Set against the violence of a lawless land, her guns explode against her enemy, taking everyone around her by surprise."
author: David    Osborne
